entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to plus 1 this morning then steady. POP 30%

Temperature falling to plus 1 this morning then steady. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
